license.comment: It is there, but requires digging. A better link would be https://github.com/OpenG2P/openg2p_discovery_spec/blob/master/LICENSE

SDG[0].comment: Yes, I feel OpenG2P does advance targets in Goal 1

SDG[1].comment: Yes, OpenG2P helps facilitate trade which will allow low-income people sell their goods to provide income. Income that will be used to purchase food.

SDG[2].comment: Access to funds will allow individuals to pay for healthcare and afford a better quality of life.

SDG[3].comment: Access to funds to improve schools, purchase educational materials.

SDG[4].comment: I do not see a direct link, however, access to financial services may help with gender equality.

SDG[5].comment: Access to funds allows for improvements to infrastructure and improvements in waste water treatment, plumbing, etc.

SDG[6].comment: Access to funds for improvements to power plants and access to renewable engergy.

SDG[7].comment: Financial services allow individuals to manage their own money and waste less. Allows employers to run their business, therefore securing the employment of the workers.

SDG[8].comment: Financial services will no longer be limited to the rich and powerful. All will have access.

SDG[9].comment: Individuals, corporations, and public sectors will be able to trade domestically and internationally. Building long lasting partnerships.

ownership.comment: The documentation is extensive and sufficient.

documentation.comment: The documentation is extensive and sufficient for the required criteria.

nonPII.comment: They offer a CSV file upload.
